title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Online Practical Training for Anaphylaxis Prevention and Management

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Accurately explain the initial response procedure for anaphylaxis within 3 minutes with 100% precision
Demonstrate the correct use of an epinephrine auto-injector (EPI-Pen) through visual simulation with at least 90% accuracy
Create an anaphylaxis prevention plan for school settings according to standard guidelines
Enhance the ability to conduct risk assessments and make emergency response decisions by at least 80% through anaphylaxis case analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
